articles.author: Fraiser Kansteiner
articles.title: Novo temporarily ousted from ABPI over online marketing breaches - FiercePharma
articles.description: Last month, Novo Nordisk’s general manager in the U.K. stepped down as president of a national pharma group as the company weathered fallout from an ill-fated LinkedIn campaign. | Novo Nordisk has been suspended from the Association of the British Pharmaceuti…
